name: INGetRideStatusIntentHandling
desc: The handler interface for fetching the status of the user’s current ride.

items.name: func confirm(intent: INGetRideStatusIntent, completion: (INGetRideStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Confirms the details of the user’s request.

items.name: func handle(intent: INGetRideStatusIntent, completion: (INGetRideStatusIntentResponse) -> Void)
items.desc: Handles providing the current status of the user’s ride.

items.name: func startSendingUpdates(for: INGetRideStatusIntent, to: INGetRideStatusIntentResponseObserver)
items.desc: Start delivering regular updates about the specified ride.

items.name: func stopSendingUpdates(for: INGetRideStatusIntent)
items.desc: Stops the delivery of status updates for the specified ride.
